summary: This document consists of email exchanges regarding a real estate transaction involving Steve Marshal. The emails discuss title searches, closing dates, and due diligence related to a property purchase. The correspondence highlights the urgency of the transaction and the involvement of various parties in the process.

persons.name: Steve Marshal
persons.context: Steve Marshal is attempting to purchase a house in Bradford and is seeking assistance with the title search and related legal questions.

persons.name: Jen Marshal
persons.context: Jen Marshal is mentioned as the spouse of Steve Marshal, who is involved in the communication regarding the property purchase.

connections.description: Steve Marshal and Jen Marshal are married, and Jen is involved in the property purchase process.

events.title: Closing Date
events.description: The closing for the property purchase is set for December 13, 2019.

events.title: Effective Date of P&S
events.description: The effective date of the Purchase and Sale agreement is marked as November 19, 2019, although the seller did not sign until November 20.

keyFacts: Steve Marshal is looking to purchase a house in Bradford and is in communication with a real estate professional for assistance.
The closing date for the property purchase is set for December 13, 2019.
There is a need for an extension of the due diligence period for the title search.
The effective date of the Purchase and Sale agreement is noted as November 19, 2019, despite the seller's later signature.
The correspondence emphasizes the urgency of the transaction and the need for timely responses.
